code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import VideoOverlay from'./VideoOverlay';import INFO from'../../data/user';import'./Projects.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const[selectedVideo,setSelectedVideo]=useState(null);const handleVideoClick=videoUrl=>{setSelectedVideo(videoUrl);};const handleCloseVideo=()=>{setSelectedVideo(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"projects",className:"projects-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Selected Works"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects-grid",children:INFO.projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"project-card",initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{duration:0.5,delay:index*0.1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-image",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.thumbnail,alt:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"view-project-btn",onClick:()=>handleVideoClick(project.url),children:"View Project"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"project-category",children:project.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"project-year",children:project.year})]})]},project.title))})]}),selectedVideo&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VideoOverlay,{videoUrl:selectedVideo,onClose:handleCloseVideo})]});};export default Projects;
